column2: the service is prompt and warm
column3: and for all the huddled masses yearning for your table
column4: you'll never feel rushed. Baby Barnaby's offers a pretty nice range of breakfast items from healthy to hangover cure. On my last visit
column5: I decided to try the Green Eggs (eggs scrambled with spinach
column7: and artichoke hearts) after hearing them talked up quite a bit. These eggs transcend the sum of their parts for a totally unique taste that's surprisingly addictive. The sides are also great- potatoes are crispy and savory
column8: not blah like most breakfast potato sides. I'm a huge fan of the chicken/apple sausage
column9: and usually sub toast for a tortilla so I can roll my own "tacos".
